vsParam:
[px], and you guys, here is your next quest!
Please go to the "Undersea Shrine Aes Regia"!

As its name suggests, it's an undersea shrine.
It's known as a giant building left by last civilization.

Um... What will we go there for?
Just go there?

No, you need to find the mermaid living there.
She may be... my first love.
Your first love is a mermaid...

Hehehe!
Of course, I've been through ignorant love too!

Hehehe, it's pretty mysterious, isn't it?
My first love is a mermaid!
Yeah, it's when I was a teenager...
Whoa, here is another long story...

I was a fisherman.
I ran into a cave accidentally and found a beautiful mermaid...

Her beauty swept me off my feet.
But that cave collapsed and I've never seen her since then.

But I want to see her again so much. So I built this...
"Golden Rod Commerce Chamber".

I see... No wonder there is so much decoration
relative to mermaids here... Now I get it.

Hehe, you want to see your first love again...
I think it's wonderful! So wonderful!

[px]!
Let's connect her with Lord Rod once again!

Yup, I'm with you.
Let's try our best to reunite Lord Rod and his first love!

Yeah!
Rod, we're leaving for the Undersea Shrine now!

Yeah, thank you guys! Oh, my dear Princess Mermaid!
Hope everything is okay with you...
